content: MT-CTR-GL OC Girder hanger Hanger for suspending MT-90 and MT-100 girders from threaded rod to create heavy-duty MEP and HVAC trapeze ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Simpler inventory – these hangers make it possible to use standard MT girders in more situations Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Compatible with MT Thread Forming Bolt channel connectors – for much faster, adaptable assembly Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Applications Assembling trapeze for MEP and HVAC installations subject to loads too heavy for strut trapeze ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 4 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Material thickness | 4 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2332794 - Connector MT-CTR-GL 1/2 OC - Package Size 16 pc - 2332795 - Connector MT-CTR-GL 5/8 OC - Package Size 16 pc
